topics.body:
Got some hidden character ideas for Shonen Jump vs. Capcom, guys. Here's what I got;

!http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110720194553/marvelvscapcom/images/1/16/Akuma.png!
Akuma

!http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100601055608/hokuto/images/6/61/Raoh_%28Hokuto_Musou_gensakuban%29.jpg!

and his Jump rival, Raoh

!http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110726231740/marvelvscapcom/images/1/11/Firebrand.png!

Firebrand

!http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20081028064244/nougamineuro/images/5/5d/Neuro_anime.jpg!

And his Jump rival, Neuro Nogami

The idea for the rivalries is simple; Akuma and Raoh both strive to become the strongest warriors and have done some questionable things, such as Akuma being consumed by the Satsui no Hado and killing his sensei, just as Raoh has done. Akuma sees himself as having trascend humanity, even if he tossed it away when he gained the power of the Satsui no Hado, and Raoh seeks to be the Conqueror at the Century's End.

With Firebrand and Neuro, both are demons, who have antagonistic natures, yet both have been seen as heroes. Firebrand has his outward appearance and Neuro looks more human, plus both are crafty, tricky devils :)

topics.body:
In my war against the mice insurgents in my house I have recently upgraded to lethal measures. More recently I have gone to baited lethality.

In the space of one and a half hours I have disposed of three mice half an hour apart. Each time I treat their limp, dead bodies to my best Francis Underwood impression as I take them to the back door to throw out.
